Class ErrorMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ErrorMessage

  • public class ErrorMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to display messages to the user.
    Author:
    Patrich Tivoli

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.swing.JFrame frame 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorMessage(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
      This constructor sets the frame for this class: in order to show the message the frame is needed.
